alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 1:22AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Light Freezing Drizzle and Freezing Fog Early This Morning... Light freezing drizzle and areas of freezing fog are likely along and east of the I-25 corridor early this morning. At this time, expect this to persist for a short period, likely ending around the 5 AM time frame. Visibility around one quarter mile with some minor ice accumulations are possible before westerly winds quickly erode the cloud cover, fog, and freezing drizzle at that time. Those traveling across the area can expect widely varying visibility and patchy slick conditions, especially on elevated surfaces, bridges, and lesser used side roads.
